name: List connectors requires read-only index privileges

error.reason: action [cluster:admin/xpack/connector/list] is unauthorized for user [entsearch-user] with effective roles [user], this action is granted by the cluster privileges [monitor_connector,manage_connector,manage,all]

root_cause.reason: action [cluster:admin/xpack/connector/list] is unauthorized for user [entsearch-user] with effective roles [user], this action is granted by the cluster privileges [monitor_connector,manage_connector,manage,all]
